title: Minute Man National Historical Park: Plan A Field Trip
body: Plan A Field Trip         There are many different ways to experience the park, including various ranger-guided and self-guided options. Ranger Guided Self Guided           Visiting Minute Man NHP and Bunker Hill   Loading the player...       Visit JWPlayer docs for keyboard shortcuts  Duration:4 minutes, 30 seconds  Visiting Minute Man NHP and Bunker Hill / Boston NHP can be a rewarding experience for students and teachers! Discover what your National Park Service has to offer!
